scripts.create: source config/config.$EnvName.env && source ../docker/config/config.$EnvName.env && run-s prep-template prep-docker create-stack wait-create-stack describe-stack
scripts.update: source config/config.$EnvName.env && source ../docker/config/config.$EnvName.env && run-s prep-template prep-docker update-stack wait-update-stack describe-stack
scripts.delete: source config/config.$EnvName.env && source ../docker/config/config.$EnvName.env && run-s prep-template delete-stack wait-delete-stack
scripts.prep-template: jsmin template.json > template.cfn.json && export DATESTAMP=`date +"%m%d%y%H%M%S"` && sed -i '' "s/_DATESTAMP_/${DATESTAMP}/g" template.cfn.json
scripts.prep-docker: source config/config.$EnvName.env && source ../docker/config/config.$EnvName.env && aws s3 cp ../docker/${DOCKERRUN_FILE} s3://${ELASTICBEANSTALK_SOURCE_BUCKET}/${DOCKERRUN_S3_PATH} --profile $AWSProfile
scripts.create-stack: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name $CFStackName --profile $AWSProfile --template-body file://template.cfn.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=Ec2InstanceKeyname,ParameterValue=$Ec2InstanceKeyname ParameterKey=EnvName,ParameterValue=$EnvName ParameterKey=DnsZoneId,ParameterValue=${DnsZoneId} ParameterKey=DnsZoneName,ParameterValue=${DnsZoneName} ParameterKey=DBSnapshotARNRestore,ParameterValue=${DBSnapshotARNRestore} ParameterKey=DBMasterUserName,ParameterValue=${DBMasterUserName} ParameterKey=DBMasterUserPassword,ParameterValue=${DBMasterUserPassword} ParameterKey=MQUsername,ParameterValue=${MQUsername} ParameterKey=MQPassword,ParameterValue=${MQPassword} ParameterKey=DBName,ParameterValue=${DBName} ParameterKey=SourceBucketName,ParameterValue=${ELASTICBEANSTALK_SOURCE_BUCKET} ParameterKey=SourcePathWeb,ParameterValue=${DOCKERRUN_S3_PATH} ParameterKey=SourcePathWorker,ParameterValue=${DOCKERRUN_S3_PATH}
scripts.update-stack: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name $CFStackName --profile $AWSProfile --template-body file://template.cfn.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=Ec2InstanceKeyname,ParameterValue=$Ec2InstanceKeyname ParameterKey=EnvName,ParameterValue=$EnvName ParameterKey=DnsZoneId,ParameterValue=${DnsZoneId} ParameterKey=DnsZoneName,ParameterValue=${DnsZoneName} ParameterKey=DBSnapshotARNRestore,ParameterValue=${DBSnapshotARNRestore} ParameterKey=DBMasterUserName,ParameterValue=${DBMasterUserName} ParameterKey=DBMasterUserPassword,ParameterValue=${DBMasterUserPassword} ParameterKey=MQUsername,ParameterValue=${MQUsername} ParameterKey=MQPassword,ParameterValue=${MQPassword} ParameterKey=DBName,ParameterValue=${DBName} ParameterKey=SourceBucketName,ParameterValue=${ELASTICBEANSTALK_SOURCE_BUCKET} ParameterKey=SourcePathWeb,ParameterValue=${DOCKERRUN_S3_PATH} ParameterKey=SourcePathWorker,ParameterValue=${DOCKERRUN_S3_PATH}
